name: Race Face Charge Knee Pads - Unisex
description: Charge the line in these minimalist knee pads. They offer abrasion protection in a comfy slip-on design, perfect for XC courses and intense trail rides.EVA foam padding, in a slip-on design.Butterfly stretch mesh, with rotated flatlock seams.Silicone gripped top hem, with shin patch.Gussetted knee.
